Lets see how deep we can go.

Reminder:

Out his right eye, the scarecrow spots what lays beneath twin stones...

Spades for Aces.
Fresh Epoch Vol 1

Commentaries on a Post-Threshold History:

-Tailor Marsh

The Anthropocene has ended.

Humanity could not survive the Threshold.

Now we are the inheritors of their ruin. 
Is it only inevitable that we should also inherit their folly? 

The truth behind what happened during the Threshold event is hotly debated; and many details have been thoroughly lost to time. What can be said for certain is that the extinction of man was by no means complete. 

So called “survivors” still roam where we Inheritors have yet to settle. Many would, however, protest the notion that these post-human forms are still truly ‘alive’. This criticism is largely true, though it has been observed that some Survivors still retain their faculties, even if the majority of their kin do not.

It must also be acknowledged that many pre-Threshold organizations, such as the N.F.T.A. (Northern Free Trade Alliance) and even sectors of the E.D.P. (Eastern Defense Pact), still operate into the modern day. Lately many of the EDP member states have transferred power to inheritor-led governments through various means. 

However, quite crucially, the NFTA is still under the leadership of prominent and powerful post-humans, and shows little signs of changing this arrangement. This political power-block is commonly referred to as The Plutocrats; their ranks consist entirely of pre-Threshold, human gentry with net worths valued in the trillions.

In the time since the Threshold, NFTA has consolidated and centralized its resources into a single federalized state apparatus. This state wields full authority over industry, economic institutions and all military forces of the North-Western world. Their reasoning for these actions are “to defend the rights and interests of free enterprise from foreign and internal threats.” 

NFTA also describes itself as a constitutional democracy, holding elections for the position of Executive Chairman between nominated Plutocrats every 8 years. According to the aforementioned constitution, only biological humans are permitted to vote in any capacity…
Returning the Earth: Chapter 1

Chap 1:
The loss of Human Greatness:

-Dillard Kempt

Truely, this “Threshold'' is the greatest tragedy that Earth, nay, the universe has ever known. No other being can rightly fill the sacred niche of mankind. No other animal could possibly measure up to the greatness that Western men have achieved. 

A despicable lie is being forged that humanity's end was due to its own folly, but we know better. 
We know that humanity was murdered, not by its own hand but by a foreign malefactor. A malignance masquerading as human.

None of this is of any consequence however; for the greatness of man can, NO, MUST be returned to this earth! And it is I who must, who will, bear this burden. Few others can remember the time before this fall; and only I have the will, the conviction to see this mission through. 

I must teach these animals, who now walk in our place, the true meaning of humanity. I will elevate them so that they may serve the righteous destiny of man with distinction and pride. This way they may earn a dignified and even civilized existence. They can not do it on their own; their minds lack the spark of man’s divinity. 

It is my duty to be their steward, and their guide.
Returning the Earth: Chapter 2

Chap 2:
My Crucible:

-Dillard Kempt

My contemporaries have failed me. The east falls to the animals. Eather itself proves finite. 

During my most recent term as Executive Chairman, I took charge of a radical but necessary initiative. My aim was the complete dedication of all Eather infrastructure towards my sacred project: re establishing mankind’s former greatness. It was already well known among the elite that the mining of Eather steadily eroded the very fabric of reality. There was only so much that could be taken before a second, much more catastrophic, threshold would be opened.

My 8 year term was however woefully insufficient to realize my goals; and my colleagues quickly recognized the implications of my plans. Drinking Eather is the only way that we can maintain ourselves; every tank-car reappropriated was an entire year off one of their long lifespans. 

My contemporaries were quick to prove their selfishness to me. I was unanimously out-voted in favor of that bastard socialist Edward Church. As soon as he established his administration, he gave an executive order that all remaining Eather would be devoted to sustaining the lives of the oligarchy. To my absolute horror, the entire table all voted to ratify this into their constitution.

This was an unforgivable betrayal, not of me but to our entire species! Our last hope of reconstruction would be wasted on extending the lives of several trillionaire elites, until the world itself unraveled at the seams. 

NO! I must act now! It is clear what must be done. I must become the sole Eather drinker on this earth. Only then will there be time for my work…
Manifesto of Ruin: Vol 1

S.R. Haley

An Unfinished Apocalypse:
Manifesto of Ruin: Vol 2

S.R. Haley

The Nature of the Beast:

The constructs of humanity had, over time, evolved into inscrutable and powerful megaliths that now operate autonomously. A process rendering the people who built them into mere components of a macro-system that perpetually works to maintain itself. This is done regardless of any conscious intentions or desires by any individuals within. 
These systems operate by incentivizing the behavior of people; compelling them to perform the necessary actions to maintain the systems that offer said incentives. A cycle of action and reward that stabilizes into a feedback-loop.

Any original purpose of these systems becomes secondary to the macro-system's primary goal of survival; or even become simply vestigial. Any notion of an original, more practical, purpose lost to time.
However, the macro-being has no way of organically distinguishing between the arbitrary and the practical, and therefore will prioritize the survival of arbitrary constructs just as well as practical ones. Thus, hierarchies and mechanisms once born out of the intentions and aspirations of long dead parties will continue to be maintained, despite no longer having any benefactor. The system may even resort to inventing new benefactors in order to justify and perpetuate these constructs.

Ultimately, those at the very top of the social-economic hierarchy are still slaves to the machine that put them there. Any political or economic power they possess can only be used to sustain the system they were born into. If they try to use their influence to make these systems more equitable, they risk the system replacing them.
From top to bottom, we are all servants of the beast.
And the beast only exists to feed itself.
Manifesto of Ruin: Vol 3

S.R. Haley

Opportunities of Decay:

But beasts may bleed…
Beasts may grow sick…
Beasts may starve…
For like in nature, no animal is guaranteed survival. 

The macro-system can not distinguish practical components from arbitrary and vestigial ones. These sub-systems of arbitrary hierarchy have grown and mutated, not unlike cancer cells. Malignant parts of the body, hungry, taking more than can be afforded.

Those at the bottom of the hierarchy are the most crucial. It is the working people who sow the fields and run the factories. They are the ones who harvest the material crucial for all survival. Without the flow of material, there can be no life. 

When the Threshold claimed the majority of humanity, this vital niche was left open. If left unfilled, those remaining at the top of the hierarchy would quite literally starve to death. We, by means left obscure, were made to fill that niche. This has only barely kept the beast alive; and the toll of its death-bell draws near.

What must be understood is that, in this late stage of its life, the beast has formed a dependency on one particular resource, paramount to all others. 

Eather.

It literally sustains the artificially inflated lifespans of those at the hierarchy's peak. The harvesting of this material has been revealed to threaten the stability of existence itself. If things continue the way they do now, then our world has an expiration date. 

As far as the beast is concerned, this death is inevitable either way; might as well eat to the end.

But WE, do not need to drink Eather.

WE do not need masters that live for centuries. 

WE do not need the beast.

WE can only survive without it. 

Today the beast is at its weakest state. It is old and sickly; its belly turned, and made vulnerable. 
The power it has boasted its whole life is now a lie.

Take no circumstance for granted. We are young, and history is fickle…
FuN MaoSe
Mercs Wanted!

We're looking for new mercs to run some odd jobs out here. We got plenty of clients paying good, gooood hard cash for some "hands on" work. 

Anyone who stops by our place of business is also invited to peruse our store and stock up on gear!

We're set up at Dock A on the west shore of Black Lake. Warehouse on the lower deck.

Serious applicants only!

-The Broker
Note From Ray.

Once you're past the perimeter, head over to a place called "The Observatory". It should be on the map I gave you. 

You'll meet some like-minded people there who know their way around.
Offer to do some odd jobs for them; they'll return the favor.

I wish it didn't have to go down like this, but at least you won't be followed into that place. Trust me, those goons are far too chicken-shit to go looking somewhere that hot.

Just don't get yourself tangled up in someone else's bullshit, right? Stay low, pay your debt, get moving. 

One day this can all be behind you. Good luck.

-Ray
If I'm Dead:

Hey,

If I'm not back by the end of summer, you can safely assume I'm dead.

My room, and everything within, goes to the first one of you bastards who can pick my lock!

However, I ask that the BIG prize gets shared by the lot of y'all!
You fuckers better use it well if I'm not back; I worked hard to find that number!

-Bixby
BREAKING NEWS!
Revolutionary Army: Orders

You have been commissioned as a soldier of the Revolutionary Coalition Army.

Your mission is to group with allied forces stationed within the West Carcosa ‘Exclusion Zone’, at the FOB code named: Borough.

You will report to senior officer “Mamma Roach”. She will be your commanding officer for the duration of this mission. She will brief you on critical mission details upon your arrival. 

Our Hearts are with you comrade!

The Hunter and the Four Stags

The hunter took to the forest, so that he might sate his hunger.
He came upon a creek and walked it, until he found its source. 

The hunter met the red stag, and between its antlers was an image of grain.
And the stag said to him: "Drink of my wine, and live by thy passions!"

The hunter knelt by the creek and took drink of its water. 
And the water tasted like good wine.

The hunter ventured deeper into the forest.
And there he found a warren among the brush.

Here he met the yellow stag, and between its antlers was a sign of grave danger.
And the stag said to him: "Roam, and grow fat off the land!"

The hunter stalked the warren and slew a rabbit.
And he cooked the rabbit and ate of its fat.

The hunter drew yet deeper into the forest. 
And he came upon an ancient, gnarled oak.

The Hunter then met the white stag, and between its antlers was the shape of a dagger.
And the stag said to him: "Kneel before us, and heed our laws!" 

The hunter gathered four limbs of cedar.
And he built an altar by the oak, and burned an offering.

The hunter pressed onward through the forest.
And he came to its end where he faced a grey marsh.

Finally, the hunter met the black stag, and between its antlers was a visage of stone.
And the stag said to him: "Fall, and know all of my burdens!" 

And the hunter fell to his knees.
And he came to know all the suffering of the world.
The Arrival of the Fae

To go digging, and to find awesome and terrible things below the ground. Did we ever wonder if those things were buried for a reason?

I've seen what shapeless things wriggle and crawl in the gaps between collective minds and the material world. Like silverfish, they gnaw slowly at the foundation of our house; unseen, unfelt, until one day we watch as the cracks open wide and the walls buckle, caving in around us all. Leaving only ruins where we stood. But these ruins will not go empty...

When we opened that threshold, other things crawled back in. Some walked and talked like men. Others skittered and howled like beasts. A few even resembled man made things, unnatural animacy forced into their stony bodies.

They bear the shapes of our myths, our fictions, our fantasies; like they were pulled straight from our minds. Perhaps this is how they adapt to our alien reality; their original way of existing impossible in our realm of light and gravity. Perhaps they were born from our imaginations; reified into life by our meddling with Eather?

None of that will ever become clear.

As the slit in time and space we cut grows wider, we ourselves become alienated from our own bodies. Our minds have started to... slip off...

Humanity will not survive the threshold. But the Fae seem able to bear what we can not. Perhaps they will still walk this broken earth long after we are gone...
Whitney's Journal

Late Summer, '87

Got another courier job for the Broker, high-value shipment coming in by boat. I'm meant to hold onto it for a spell before handing it over to Dock A. Insurrection has been making runs out there, need to wait for my opening.
Got my hands on the shipment; this is premium shit right here. Broker would be very mad if it never got to him. I better find a good hiding place and lay low at my safe room in the Blue House.

It's funny how the loners use a wolf as their symbol. I guess it's supposed to have something to do with the old myth of "lone wolves"?

It's ironic because real wolves famously live in packs. But then again, I never see any of these bastards actually travel alone...

Some of the guys here found out who I've been working with. I was under the impression that wasn't going to be a problem, but maybe what they say about everyone having their price is true.

It's a good thing I decided to bury the shipment someplace safe for now, a good hiding place too. Even if I'm forced to have a session with "The Therapist", they'll never find it.
Just got to remember, it's right between the legs.
MODEL 46 E.M.D.P. MAIN CONTROL PANEL MANUAL

Overview:

-Controls: Pg. 2

-Alarms: Pg. 3

-Priming Cycle: Pg. 4

-Pulse Cycle: Pg. 5

-Output Cycle: Pg. 6

-Cooling Cycle: Pg. 7

-Modes & Operations: Pg. 8

-Additional Warnings: Pg. 9

Controls:

-On the far left most panel is the systems monitor.
-These lights will indicate that the labeled systems are activated. 
-Output Pump, Heat Exchange and System Polarity can be toggled on this board.

-To the right of that are the Temperature and PSR Meters.
-These must be monitored at all times while operating the panel!

-In the center left is a key-pad. This is where program codes are entered into the system.
-The indicator light to its right will blink at the beginning of each cycle.

-In the center right is the Emergency Reset Button. 
-When pressed it will automatically reset all systems to a semi-stable state.
-The indicator light to its right indicates that the Automated Emergency Reset System is engaged. 

-Right of that is the Cycle Display Screen.
-This will display the current Cycle step, Coolant flow, Ventilation status, and Laser Aperture status.

-On the far right most panel is the cycles monitor.
-These lights will indicate when the labeled drill functions are being executed.

Alarms:

-Far left, with yellow marker is the Emergency Alarm.

-Below the pressure gauge is the Pressure Alarm.

-Below the temperature gauge is the Overheat Alarm.

-The yellow light above the keypad is the Error Signal.

-The blue light above the keypad is the Program Confirmation Signal.

-Above the Emergency Reset Switch is the Emergency Reset Alarm.

-Far right with the 'X' marker is the Malfunction Alarm.

Cycle A: Priming

During this cycle, the drill will prime its control instructions. 
These instructions can be configured using the keypad.

Program Codes:

-Lower Cycle Speed: 4111
-Raise Cycle Speed: 4222

-Activate Automated Safety Systems: 9902
-Deactivate Automated Safety Systems: 9901

-Reset Drill Phase: 8855


Warning: 

-A Drill Phase Reset command requires PSR to be above 30 BAR, and Temp to be above 100C!
-Heat Exchange must be deactivated before resetting the Drill Phase.
-Heat Exchange must be deactivated before inverting System Polarity. 
-Heat Exchange must be deactivated before reactivating the Output Pump.

Cycle B: Drill Pulse & Ventilation

The system will passively ventilate exhaust pressure during this cycle.
The Ventilation rate can be configured using the keypad.

-Enter 3 digits to set the ventilation percentage: (001-100)

The Laser Aperture can be configured using the keypad.

-Set the System Polarity to Positive to add, or Negative to subtract.
-Enter 2 digits into the keypad representing the amount added/subtracted. (00-99)

Cycle C: Product Output 

During this phase, the Output Pump will move Eather from the drill into storage.

These systems can be configured with the switches on the left panel.

Warning:

-If the Drill phase and output pump are not both running in the same direction, this can cause dangerous pressure build up in the drill!

Cycle D: Cooling

This cycle will cool the drill system using the Heat Exchange.
The amount of coolant pumped through the Heat Exchange can be configure using the keypad:

-Enter 5 digits:
-The first digit indicates subtraction vs. addition. (0,1)
-The last 4 digits are the value. (0001-9999)
-Refer to the above figure for proper syntax notation.

Modes and Operations:

-Prime Command: Primes Cycle Order at beginning of each set.

-Drill Running: Indicates that the drill is in operation.

-Drill Pulse: Indicates that the drill is performing a mining pulse.

-Forward Phase: Indicates that the drill is running in its mining phase, extracting Eather.

-Polarity: Toggles the system polarity when inputting operational commands.

-Output Pump: Product is being pumped respective of the current flow direction.

-Pump Reverser: Reverses Product pump flow direction.

-Exhaust System: Pumps exhaust from the drill, can be configured to increase or reduce pressure. 

-Cooling System: Denotes Cooling Cycle, this is when the Heat Exchange will be engaged. 

-Heat Exchange: Actively cools drill system, can be configured to increase or reduce coolant amount.

Additional Warnings:

-If Heat or PSR are allowed to reach critical points, this will cause a catastrophic mechanical failure!

-Automated Safety Systems may fail in the case of a malfunction!

-Always manually press the emergency reset in the case of a system malfunction!

-This system does not track and display levels of polarized Eather feedback!

-Temperature must be below 500C when deactivating the Drill!
Drill Worker's Journal

Five seconds...
Click!

The beast waits.

Five seconds...
Click!

The beast roars! It takes a bite from the bedrock.

Five seconds...
Click!

The beast swallows.

Five seconds...
Click!

The beast yawns, foul heat and smoke pour from its terrible belly...

Five seconds...

They were creatures of stellarite, fingers and jawbones reaching up at us from that hole we dug... 
The hole we still dig...

We drain the life-blood of creation from our well. 

Five seconds...
Click!

I look into that pit, red light flashing in torrents.

I see stars below me where there should be bedrock.

We have pierced our earth in ways unforgivable.

Five seconds...

Do they seek to persecute us, or did we break them out of some prison? 

Five seconds...

Did we create them?

Click!

"To go digging, and to find awesome and terrible things below the ground. Did they ever wonder if those things were buried for a reason?"

There is no such thing as magic, all the secrets of nature come to bear regardless of our understanding. Science is merely us recording what we find.

But look what we have found.

Five seconds...
Click!
Upon the Primary:

Infinite strand lays out below a silent sun.

Familiar altars dot the surrounding dunes.

Dusk holds the earth in perpetuity. 

The water licks warmly and calmly at the dreamer's feet.

Portals remain barred, opening only for latchkeys found in the waking world.

Lamps hang on the horizon, beckoning with sweet promise. 

Memories take hard shape here.

They are not illusions.

Things taken from the Primary, remain taken.

Things forsaken to this terrace, remain upon the strand.

The dreamer can not linger.

One must return from the dream.
Upon the Secondary

To imbibe deeper into the dream is sin.

Shades lurk among the secondary.

Grave icons carve themselves into the dark slate.

Only fog hangs below the grey sun.

The dreamer is forsaken within this terrace. 

Death feasts above and below the lattice. 

No treasures are to be claimed here; what is abducted is forfeit.

No truth can be observed in the secondary.

Heed our laws!

This dream is forbidden to all things that walk and crawl.

This dream is forbidden to all things that fly and swim.

This dream is forbidden to all things that live and die.
Upon the Tertiary

Engulfing this terrace spans a black drink that swallows all cardinality, sparing the third.

The volume seats itself above a flat and even plane, merely leaving standing space between.

Above hangs a silent, grey tempest. 

All is preserved this way; no horizon divides the sphere.

At the very focal point, a single sentinel stands, submerged to mere inches, suspended in perfect stillness.

The body is held by no footing and tied by no yoke. 

No current sways its perfect tranquility. 

It stands silent and fixed, like all else in the tertiary.

Entering the bath is not dissimilar to probing a black lake.

Breath will escape the dreamer.

Below this obscure tower lies the ultimate prize of sin. 

The fetish of the black stag.

To hold it is to know all the suffering of the earth.

It may never depart the dreamer's grasp.

One will be blind to the light of Polaris.
The Wellspring

There, in the western lands.

Where the sea people met the supplicants of the God Star.

North of two great lakes.

And west of the mountain of Kine, where the warrior Urmal was slain by the red dragon.

Below, deep in a fissure of the earth, lays a wellspring.

Where the lifeblood of creation flows like hot mineral water.

The blood of creation can be used to perform great and terrible magics. 

It is said that the archer demigod, Elin, crafted enchanted arrowheads with this life blood.

And with them she felled the great armies of the east, and brought 50 Sultans to kneel.

And that drinking the blood from the wellspring gave her a fortieth decade.

Among this wellspring, there are exotic gems.

Their luster possess the holy light of stars. 

They can be ground into a fine powder.

When imbibed, one may venture into waking dreams.
Entrance?
By the water.
AG-04
Dr. Quinn's Note

I can't say anything out loud; I don't want to alert his suspicions.

I'm beginning to question Dr. Mosby's objectivity when it comes to this plan...

During our experiment with reversing the micro drill, I noticed an alarming amount of Eather feedback.
Mosby keeps trying to assure me it's "completely nominal", but with no way of scaling our experiment it's impossible to know just how severe this feedback will be with the real thing. 

It's entirely possible that Dr. Mosby is correct, and that the feedback will scale linearly.
But for him to rest everything on that conclusion? It's not scientific. 

I know your options are limited here; they are for all of us. You're the only one who'll immediately be able to tell if reversing the drill is truly dangerous, so it's down to your discretion at the moment. 

Have a contingency in place!

Cistern Facility:
Prototype Drill Lab: PD-002
Arcana VII - XII

VII The Forest:

Nature, the animal. 
Freedom and anarchy.


The Forest is not the domain of man. 
Nature knows not the yoke.
The Forest is the home of the free.


VIII The City:

Humanity, organization, hierarchy. The many.

The city is the domain of men and kings. 
This is the home of order and authority.

IX The Rook:

One that bears witness, sees from far away, untouchable and remote.

The Rook knows but does not act. 


X The Gate:

Transition, threshold, passage from one state to another. 

To pass through The Gate is to change, and to come upon new things.

XI The Obelisk:

Unmoving, permanent, unchangeable, ever-present.

The Obelisk is older than time, and will stand long after the stars go dark.



XII The WellSpring:

Life, creation, beginning, source.

All things were born from The WellSpring. From it flows the lifeblood of creation.
Arcana XIII - XVIII

XIII Martyr:

Sacrifice, Instigation, bringer of change. 

The Martyr will spark great change, and perpetuation. They are a turning point.


XIV Daggers:

Violence, vengeance, justice, authority.

The Dagger is the application of force, fear, and pain. It is an instrument of one's will.

XV Harmony:

Cooperation, fate, destiny, positive compromise.

There is a crossroads where forces intersect. Things that are meant to be will come to be here.


XVI Ouroboros:

Infinity, cycles, repetition, rebirth and revision. 

The Ouroboros forever spins in a circle. It is opposed to change and transition.

XVII The Alchemist:

One who acts, who brings their will to pass, doer of mighty things.

The Alchemist achieves their will through their own resolve. They do of their own accord and through their own works. 



XVIII The Night:

The dark, the unseen, the obscure. Truth without entitlement. Opacity. 

Things in The Night are true and unknown. It holds mysteries and secrets.
Arcana XIX - XXIV

XIX Hunger:


The lowest, most base aspect of all life.

Unconquerable, no thing stands above Hunger. No man nor god is mightier than Hunger. 



XX Wisdom:

The application of truth. Higher knowledge.

To have Wisdom is to understand, and to accept ignorance. To rest one's own will.

XXI Fear:

Emotion, lack of control, lack of will. Driven by outside forces.

Fear is the death of one's will. It is the enemy of resolve. But it is also a protector from true danger.




XXII Tempest:

Inevitable, chaotic, offensive divinity.

The Tempest is coming. Heed the warnings.

XXIII Construct:

Planning, creation, reification.

The Construct is will made manifest. The culmination of works.



XXIV The Sea:

Finality, the end of things.

The sea is the terminus. The true end.

NOTICE:

Increased sightings of infected feral dogs in the southern zone! 
They've been seen roaming in large packs; stalkers are advised to keep wary!



ALSO: Fall is Mudfish season; stay out of the water, especially in Black Lake!
Dangerous Fae of The Zone

The Fae are as diverse as they are mysterious. It's said they arrived in this world during the "Threshold" that ended humanity. Many forms of Fae are harmless, some even intelligent; however within the Exclusion Zone surrounding Port Rale, many are quite dangerous and aggressive.

The following are various accounts of harmful and malicious Fae that should be avoided by stalkers in the Zone.

Hesh:

The Hesh are insect-like Fae beasts that mostly live underground. However, they have been seen coming out of their burrows on rare dark nights in search of food.

They are timid creatures, moving in large groups. Though they will attack if provoked. 

They seem to subsist mostly off of fungus and dead creatures, including inheritors and other Fae.

Mostly harmless, so long as you avoid them.

The Not-Deer:

Large, hulking hairy beasts. Legend says they manifest from the corpses of wild animals that were contaminated by Eather. 

They are violent and highly aggressive; attacking just about anything they see, hear or smell. Though they are dangerous, stalkers are encouraged to kill them on sight whenever encountered, as they are a huge nuisance that should not be allowed to go unchecked. 

Although they are intimidating and hardy, they are actually fairly straightforward to dispatch:
Shotguns, grenades, and high-caliber rounds are your best bet. They also hate fire!

FireBird:

A rare and ferocious form of Fae: The FireBird often stalks abandoned industrial areas, as if it's looking for something.

Should it get aggravated, it will chase down its target and attempt to  immolate them with a torrent of flame. 

Their hides are stony and brittle, making them resilient to many forms of damage. Armor piercing rounds, explosives, and even blunt force are most effective, although I'd say the best strategy is to give them a wide berth, and let some other idiot have that fight.

The 'Handy Man':

On occasion, an unwary stalker might find their eye wandering, only to have themselves snatched up and taken off their feet by one of these deadly beasts.

They wander, slowly and silently through the abandoned wastes, rarely going out of their way to pick a fight.

However, if you should look directly at one of these 'Handy Men', they'll grab you from across great distances, pulling you in and attempting to maul and mutilate. Often they try to grab at the victim's head and face with their many hands, pulling it into their maw. Perhaps to try and gouge out the offending eyes that spotted him.

If you get pulled away by one of these foul beasts, try your best to look away and run. 

I couldn't get any photos of a 'Handy Man'.

There are other types of Fae in the zone, especially further north. 

But I'm not dumb enough to go north, so I don't know jack-shit about those ones.
NFTA Field Report: 'Flayers'

CLASSIFIED
FR 101-17-3 ENCOUNTER REPORT
IMPLDATE: Pending

REPORT RECORD OF HOSTILE ENCOUNTER: F516
ENCOUNTER: "FLAYER" ENTITY

SGT LOWRY J.
AUG 07, '87 PT - 13:11

DAGGER 77 ACTUAL:
Reporting encounter with three hostile entities, confirmed kill on all targets, zero casualties. 

Targets have been colloquially identified as "Flayers".
Their appearance is consistent between both military and civilian sightings: 

-Skeletal body, standing upright.

-Two sickle shaped blades where hands would otherwise be.

-Composed of a mix of human and animal remains animated by Eather-based technology. Technology similar to that used to sustain post-humans.

-Head of a deer, goat or other similar hooved animal. 

-Long, rigid bony tail. 

-Torso built out of human ribcage, contains critical machine components. 

-Covered in rotting fur and flesh. Can sometimes be smelled before seen.

-Aggressively hostile, will charge targets at alarming speed. Will attempt to injure or kill target via blades at end of arms.

-Often seen in small groups, rarely alone.

ADDITIONAL NOTES:

Entity is vulnerable to conventional fire, incendiaries, explosives, and blunt force. 

Entity is resistant to armor penetrating rounds; these will pass through their body with minimal effect unless a critical point is struck. 

These entities seem to ignore other, similar constructs, such as the "Homunculus" and "Husk".

Threat level is considered moderate, however all forces are advised to destroy these entities on sight. Especially if encountered by ground teams. 

The machine components and consistent makeup of these entities, and similar entities, implies that they are man-made.

Then there's one in the old market hall near the Blue House.

No idea where the rest are, I can't ask too many more questions...

They're looking for me now, I have to lie low.

Test Drill Memo

Attention RG East Science staff:

Laboratory No. PD-002 is conducting important Eather drilling stability tests at Dr. Mosby's request. 

They will be in need of our Mk. 7 Prototype Laser Head, as their Mk. 4  head has been decommissioned. 

Dr. Mosby has already signed off on this request. Please prepare the drill head for transport. 

Thank you, staff. The relevant documentation has been attached to this memo.
Orders From High Command

The time has come to pacify the southern zone and rid it of criminal and terrorist activity!

All irregular forces in the southern exclusion zone are to be mobilized, effective immediately: 
Patrol routes are to be extended westward into contested territory as part of a mass harassment campaign. 
The aim of this campaign is to disrupt enemy activity in the area while also drawing the attention of NFTA forces, allowing our advanced units to proceed north with fewer obstacles.

All southern patrols are hereby ordered to engage any non-allied forces as hostile combatants with zero discretion. 
All armed trespassers are to be assumed hostile and shall be engaged at the unit leader's discretion.
This order also extends to hostile post-human survivors. In Kempt's own words: "They are already dead; I will not allow petty sympathy to jeopardize our mission any longer."

Additionally: Our campaign in the north is stretching our resources thin. It is imperative that our elite troops be properly equipped in order to carry out our main objective. 
Therefore, our more expendable forces will have to make do with what can be scraped together on short notice. 

Have faith that any true patriot should be perfectly capable of persevering through these difficult conditions!

TERRA REDDITA!
